newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PHILIPPINE STOCKS - factors to watch - March 7.
newsitem.headline: PHILIPPINE STOCKS - factors to watch - March 7.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Philippine stocks on Friday:
* On Thursday, the Dow Jones slipped 1.15 points to 6,944.70. PLDT's ADR dipped $0 5/8 to $59 7/8.
* The peso closed higher at 26.321 to the dollar vs 26.323.
* The Philippine Stock Exchange composite index dropped 12.48 points to 3,279.82.
* The Philippine interbank call loan average was unchanged at 10.46875 percent.
